author: pkalbhor
body:
#### PR description:
Bug fix for `cmsDriver.py` which when used with `--dump_python` was giving inconsistent/incorrect output. Issue was raised few times already [Issue#37976](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37976), [Issue#38686](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38686)

P.S. My first PR to cmssw :)
title: Fix inconsistent behaviour of --dump_python
